articles.description: Rock band U2 headline the new ball-shaped venue as it finally opens its doors to the public.
articles.content:
The new ball-shaped venue and world's largest LED, the Las Vegas Sphere, is now open to the public.
Irish rock band U2 played the first show of its residency on 29 September.
